sentence_tagged: Summary In vivo and in vitro analyses indicate that transcription of the @Regulated$ gene coding for an arginine exporter is regulated by the global transcriptional regulator @TF$ , an effect that went by unnoticed in previous genome - scale screenings of the Lrp regulatory network in Escherichia coli .

Summary In vivo and in vitro analyses indicate that transcription of the @Regulated$ gene coding for an arginine exporter is regulated by the global transcriptional regulator Lrp , an effect that went by unnoticed in previous genome - scale screenings of the @TF$ regulatory network in Escherichia coli .
